thread.title: Kendall Jenner and Bella Hadid go wild at the celeb-packed Burberry and LOVE magazine bash in London
thread.title_full: Kendall Jenner and Bella Hadid go wild at the celeb-packed Burberry and LOVE magazine bash in London

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Kendall Jenner and Bella Hadid go wild at the celeb-packed Burberry and LOVE magazine bash in London
text:
Kendall Jenner and Bella Hadid at the LOVE party in London (Photo: Getty) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Models-of-the-moment Kendall Jenner and Bella Hadid took over the LOVE magazine and Burberry London Fashion Week bash on Monday night. 
Both girls looked fierce dressed in two very different designs for the occasion - Kendall was dressed in a cosy-looking white Burberry couture cape and white dress, while Bella was oozing sex appeal in a sexy black wrap around dress. 
Bella, who was also rocking much darker locks, teamed the dress with glamorous thigh-high black boots. Bella Hadid (R) and Kendall Jenner (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Guest, Lily Donaldson, Bella Hadid and Kendall Jenner (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Kendall was also rocking one gold tooth (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
The pretty pair, who were also joined by singer and model Justine Skye and Stella Maxwell, posed up a storm inside Annabel's as they partied the night away. 
Later on, Bella, 20, took to Instagram to share some love for her pal, writing alongside a picture of the reality star: "Best friend for life." Justine Skye (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
Other guests at the bash included Kate Moss' little sister Lottie, singer Ellie Goulding, Alice Dellal and Daisy Lowe . 
Rafferty Law, Nick Grimshaw and Thomas Cohen also made an appearance. Kendall Jenner (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Daisy Lowe and Gwendoline Christie (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Zoe Blue and Thomas Cohen (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Ellie Goulding (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
The girls have been in the capital since the fashion extravaganza kicked off late last week and appear to have been making the most of their downtime when not strutting their stuff on catwalks. 
Just the previous night they were pictured meeting up at exclusive restaurant Sexy Fish before heading to Box night club. Like us on Facebook
